item.title: Company bosses warn over tariffs impact
item.description: Several firms have cut their profit forecasts or withdrawn them citing economic uncertainty.

item.title: Can India really stop river flowing into Pakistan?
item.description: After a deadly militant attack in Kashmir, India suspended a key water treaty with neighbouring Pakistan.

item.title: Watch: How previous Popes were laid to rest
item.description: From Pius XII to Benedict XVI, the BBC looks back at video from papal funerals since 1958.

item.title: TikTok astrologer arrested for predicting new Myanmar quake
item.description: The prediction caused panic weeks after a 7.7 magnitude quake killed 3,500 people, authorities say.

item.title: Ukraine may have to give up land for peace - Kyiv Mayor Klitschko
item.description: Vitali Klitschko tells the BBC that although unfair, it could be a temporary solution to end the fighting.
